item.title: Flap Position Indicator System – Position Needles

note.para: Observe operable Flap Position Indicator needle for proper flap operation.
Absence of LE Slat/TE Flap Asym and LE Slat/TE Flap Disagree EICAS message(s) indicates proper slat/flap operation.

placard.para: Placard next to Flap Position Indicator needle "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
